modShortDescription: A new workstation that mines slowly the selected mineral. Uses gas a material and augers as tool. Needs at least 1 auger to work, with a max of 3.
modDescription:
A new workstation that mines slowly the selected mineral. Uses gas a material and augers as tool. Needs at least 1 auger to work, with a max of 3\. The quality and amount of augers used decreases the [mining](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-mining/) time to a max of 30 min per stack of 1000\. Generates a bit more heat than a forge, so be careful.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/Snufki-n/Snufkin_Modlets/tree/master/Snufkin_Autominer)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/18673-snufkins-assorted-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Snufkin](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/snufkin/)
